channel.title: [plz-help]WHAT THE HELL IS declare?![plz]
channel.description:
what the hell is declare on almost every tut it sayz declare those things i know i'm maby n00by n0w but plz h3lp [example from [Renamed] IP And Port Switcher ]
In this tutorial I'll be showing you how to add a new lines simalar to the username/password on login but instead its for the server IP and the server port. I made this tutorial fresh from scratch as I was adding it to my client. First off open up client.java We are going to DECLARE two new strings. One for the port and one for the IP. Code: private String myServer, myPort;

item.title: [plz-help]WHAT THE HELL IS declare?![plz]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

To declare a variable or method is to basically state its data type and name.

Here’s an example of declaring a string variable:

String aString = "This is a String";

See - I’ve declared the data type and name (and also gave it a value).

You can also add modifiers:

public static String aString = "This is a String";

Read full topic

item.title: [plz-help]WHAT THE HELL IS declare?![plz]
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Exactly what Hellhamster said. Here is an example:

If you were going to declare “public boolean summon = false;” you would open client.java find where it says

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Then place it directly below it like this:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public boolean summon = false;

Read full topic
